meanings.definition: The quality of being cute or charming in an overly sweet or sentimental way.
meanings.sent1: The cutesiness of the puppy made everyone smile.
meanings.sent2: Her room was filled with cutesiness, from the pink walls to the fluffy pillows.
meanings.sent3: The cutesiness of the teddy bear wearing a tiny hat was almost too much to handle.
meanings.sent4: The cutesiness of the baby's laughter was like a warm hug on a cold day.
meanings.sent5: The cutesiness of the kitten playing with a ball of yarn was captured in the photo.

meanings.definition: Excessive or affected cuteness or charm.
meanings.sent1: The cutesiness decorations at the party were a bit overwhelming.
meanings.sent2: She spoke in a cutesiness tone that grated on his nerves.
meanings.sent3: The cutesiness outfit she wore made her look like a living doll.
meanings.sent4: Her cutesiness smile could brighten even the gloomiest of days.
meanings.sent5: The cutesiness mannerisms of the child were endearing to everyone around.
